item.title: .NET / SharePoint / SQL Server (emeryville)
item.description:
We are a software and database development firm delivering solutions based on .NET, SharePoint, and SQL Server. We are looking for several engineers very strong in at least one of these three areas of expertise. We have some great projects starting up, and this is a great opportunity for passionate, talented professionals.

These positions are contract, but could become full-time for highly qualified candidates.

Work must be performed at one of our offices, or at the client site (no remote workers or telecommuting). We will work with principals only - please no recruiters.
item.dc:title: .NET / SharePoint / SQL Server (emeryville)
